statements: SELECT * FROM bank_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM bank_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT amount, transaction_type FROM bank_transactions WHERE account_id = 12345;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM bank_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM bank_transactions WHERE transaction_type IN ('Deposit', 'Withdrawal') AND amount < 0;
SELECT * FROM bank_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM bank_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM bank_transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT account_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM bank_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' GROUP BY account_id HAVING num_transactions >= 10 ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount FROM bank_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Withdrawal' AND amount <= 500 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 100
SELECT transaction_description, amount FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_description LIKE '%deposit%'
SELECT transaction_description, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT statement_date, statement_balance FROM bank_statements
SELECT id, transaction_description, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(amount) FROM transaction_records;
SELECT id, statement_balance FROM bank_statements WHERE statement_balance > 1000;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transaction_records;
SELECT * FROM BankStatements;
SELECT statement_id, account_id, statement_date, closing_balance FROM BankStatements;
SELECT statement_id, account_id, statement_date, closing_balance FROM BankStatements WHERE account_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, transaction_date, amount, description FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM BankStatements WHERE account_id=1 ORDER BY statement_date DESC;
SELECT statement_id, statement_date, closing_balance FROM BankStatements WHERE closing_balance > 1000 ORDER BY closing_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT statement_id, closing_balance FROM BankStatements JOIN ReconciliationStatus ON BankStatements.statement_id = ReconciliationStatus.statement_id WHERE ReconciliationStatus.is_reconciled = TRUE;
SELECT statement_id, account_id, statement_date FROM BankStatements WHERE statement_date >= '2022-01-01' AND statement_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM bank_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_number, transaction_amount FROM bank_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT statement_id, statement_date, statement_balance FROM bank_statements WHERE statement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT account_number, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM bank_transactions GROUP BY account_number;
SELECT * FROM reconciled_transactions JOIN bank_statements ON reconciled_transactions.statement_id = bank_statements.statement_id;
SELECT * FROM bank_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT statement_id, statement_date, statement_balance FROM bank_statements WHERE statement_balance > 10000;
SELECT * FROM reconciled_transactions WHERE matched_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY reconciliation_date DESC;
SELECT distinct discrepancy_type, count(discrepancy_id) FROM discrepancies GROUP BY discrepancy_type ORDER BY count(discrepancy_id) DESC;

SELECT bt.transaction_id, bt.transaction_date, bs.statement_id, bs.statement_date FROM bank_transactions bt JOIN reconciled_transactions rt ON bt.transaction_id = rt.transaction_id JOIN bank_statements bs ON rt.statement_id = bs.statement_id;
SELECT * FROM Bank_Statements;
SELECT statement_id, statement_date FROM Bank_Statements WHERE statement_amount > 1000;
SELECT statement_id, statement_amount FROM Bank_Statements ORDER BY statement_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Recorded_Transactions WHERE description LIKE '%deposit%';
SELECT log_id, status FROM Reconciliation_Log WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM Bank_Statements WHERE statement_amount > 1000 ORDER BY statement_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, status FROM Reconciliation_Log WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY log_id;
SELECT * FROM Recorded_Transactions WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT audit_id, timestamp FROM Reconciliation_Audit WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT description FROM Recorded_Transactions WHERE description LIKE '%deposit%' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
